name: SkuGal Driver
description: SkuGal  We are making an intelligence move towards the process of the way attendance is taken today, we want to connect parents and students with the teachers on a single click to increase the availability of teachers to their corresponding student-related problem or any other problem faced by their parents regarding the performance of their children to build a transparent ecosystem that will help focus on the upliftment of the students.    iTracking: Keep track from the pickup to the drop of your children travelling by school bus via iTracking on SkuGal. Secure way of knowing where the children are and how much time he/she will take to reach home/school. Track every moment of the driver as well by monitoring the route he follows. And direct access to the driver for any pickup and drop location upgrade on a one go. The secure mean of monitoring the path your loved ones are travelling through.   Changing the education system #Beautiful interface We at SkuGal work and innovate new ways to make the information more lucid, natural and precise so that you can focus on your childrens educational progress as well manage your day to day activity with ease.  #Transperncy & Security SkuGal creates a transparent ecosystem between the schools and parents to transfer information with security.   #Sync your Life Focus on your life progress with the growth of your children, for instance, SkuGal iTracking lets your family save around one hour every day.  #Save your Time SkuGal iTracking lets your family save around one hour every day. The class teachers save 10-15 minutes of his/her time while taking attendance every day.  #Artificial Intelligence  SkuGal uses AI heavily to better understand the need of students , the iProfiling feature understands the behaviour of individual students and creates a score so that the parents understand their children better.
